Model training with SuperDuperDB

There are currently two ways to train a model in SuperDuperDB. The first way uses superduperdb.collection.Collection.create_semantic_index and the second way uses superduperdb.collection.Collection.create_imputation. These are very generic wrappers for respectively representation training, and tasks which involving predicting something from something else.

Components

Training your own semantic index requires a few more components than using pre-trained models. For training we need these things:

  • One or more models

  • A loss function

  • One or more metrics

  • …
